title: Network Share Mounter (de.fau.rrze.NetworkShareMounter)
description: Jamf Manifest for Network Share Mounter v3

networkShare.description: Example: smb://filer.your.domain.tld/share. Note: %USERNAME% will be replaced with the current user's login name.
networkShare.title: Server and share

authType.title: Authentication type
authType.description: Authentication type for the share, it can be either through Kerberos (krb) or using a username/password (auth). Default: Kerberos.

username.title: Username (Optional)
username.description: Optional: Predefine a username for authentication using username/password

mountPoint.title: Mount point name (Optional)
mountPoint.description: Change the mount point name for the network share. Leave blank for the default value (recommended)

options.infoText: If not set, the share name will be used.

location.title: Mount path
location.description: Path where network shares will be mounted. Leave blank for the default value (highly recommended)

cleanupLocationDirectory.title: Clean up obstructing files and directories
cleanupLocationDirectory.description: If set to true, the mount location will be cleaned up from obstructing files and directories. Please read the wiki before enabling this option and use it with caution!

autostart.title: Enable autostart
autostart.description: If set to true, the app will be launched on user-login

canQuit.title: Show Exit
canQuit.description: Show exit button in the menu bar

canChangeAutostart.title: Allow autostart changes
canChangeAutostart.description: Allow users to change the autostart settings

unmountOnExit.title: Unmount shares on exit
unmountOnExit.description: Unmount shares if the app get closed

helpURL.title: Help URL
helpURL.description: Configure a website link to help users interact with the application.

kerberosRealm.title: Kerberos Realm
kerberosRealm.description: Kerberos/AD Domain for user authentication. If set, automatic AD/Kerberos authentication and ticket renewal will be enabled

keychainiCloudSync.title: Keychain iCloud sync
keychainiCloudSync.description: Enable iCloud sync for Network Share Mounter keychain entries if the user's iCloud keychain is available.

keyChainService.title: Keychain Service
keyChainService.description: Human readable service name of keychain item entry

keyChainComment.title: Keychain comment
keyChainComment.description: User visible comment for keychain item entry
keyChainComment.default: Generated and used by Network Share Mounter

networkShares.title: Network shares (Deprecated)
networkShares.description: ⚠️ Deprecated with version 3. Value will be removed in a future version of the Network Share Mounter.
